00036 /*
00037  * REBASE macros take kernel desktop addresses and convert them into
00038  * user addresses.
00039  *
00040  * REBASEALWAYS converts a kernel address contained in an object
00041  * REBASEPWND casts REBASEALWAYS to a PWND
00042  * REBASE only converts if the address is in kernel space.  Also works for NULL
00043  * REBASEPTR converts a random kernel address
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifdef _USERK_
00047 
00048 #define REBASEALWAYS(p, elem) ((p)->elem)
00049 #define REBASEPTR(obj, p) (p)
00050 #define REBASE(p, elem) ((p)->elem)
00051 #define REBASEPWND(p, elem) ((p)->elem)
00052 #endif  // _USERK_
00053
